name: Clockwork Elf (cornfab)
description:
Conceit

You are a toy elf created to journey across the north pole. Turn up the heat in the toy factory to save xmas.

All controls are multi-use and can be applied to other objects.

Made in 10 days for VimJam 3.

Controls
  • Click on actions to reassign them
  • WASD/Arrow Keys: move
  • E: Interact
  • X: Kill
  • R: Reset level
  • F: Turn up the heat (cosmetic only with fire)

If you can't interact with something you're in range of, try leaving and reentering its zone

Addl Credits Sprites (all modified)
  • Tiny Biomes by Vryell
  • The Mighty Pack by The Mighty Palm
  • Top Down Adventure Assets by Ansimuz
  • Steampunk Cogs by Admurin
  • Elf sprite, boss sprites by cornfab (me)
Fonts
  • OldWizard by Angel
  • NES Cryllic by xbost
Audio
  • SFX by Kenney.nl
  • Music by cornfab (me)
  • Splat and snow footsteps SFX by cornfab (me)

Palette: Vinik24 by Vinik


--- Thank you for playing, feedback always appreciated ---
